name: Branches of Yggdrasil
description:
Branches of Yggrasil is an open-world 3rd Person ARPG that will drop the player in one of the nine realms held by Yggdrasil in Norse Mythology. The player will be able to freely explore the world whilst also being able to dig deeper uncovering a narrative embedded in the world itself. Along the way, the player will encounter enemies different and alike, as well as come face to face with the most valiant foes in the land.

Build V0.1
